anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: These headaches... Every day it gets stronger...

anyType.Name: Doctor
anyType.Text: I understand that it's very hard for you. Your condition is really terrible.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Sorry Doctor, I'm not sure I can hold on much longer.

anyType.Name: Doctor
anyType.Text: You know, I'm worried about your words. I called you today for a reason, I want to tell you something.

anyType.Name: Doctor
anyType.Text: We have found a way to put you out of your misery, or to be more precise, to perform brain surgery.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Doctor, that's wonderful.

anyType.Name: Doctor
anyType.Text: However, it's not that simple. The operation will really ease your suffering. But there is also a risk here - the chances of success are low, you may lose the ability to walk or other complications will arise.

anyType.Name: Doctor
anyType.Text: The operation is too complicated and as a result the situation may become even worse.

anyType.Name: Doctor
anyType.Text: That's why I called you today.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Doctor, this is... me...

anyType.Name: Doctor
anyType.Text: I understand that the decision is not an easy one, and the operation can be both a salvation and an even bigger nightmare. I'm giving you a few days to think about it. When I call you again, you will have to give your final answer.

anyType.Name: Doctor
anyType.Text: I can advise you not to spend these days sitting at home and deeply immersed in your thoughts. Try to take a walk, distract yourself.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Okay, I'll try.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: I'm finally home.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: What should I do...

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: I'm so scared.

anyType.Name: Phone
anyType.Text: You have a new message.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Aaaaaah!!! I'm so tired of what they want from me at such a time.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Yes, well, that's all, the morning is wiser in the evening. I'm going to go to bed, it's hardly something important.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Am I standing in the middle of my room? But I was just lying in my bed...

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Something is wrong here, for some reason the room doesn't look like it usually does, but I can't figure out why.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Hello.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Who are you?

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Who am I? Well, it's going to be hard to explain, so let's skip this question.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: What is this place? This is not my room.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: How stupid you are, this is your dream.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Why do I feel so light?

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: As I said, all this is your dream, everything that your subconscious wants is manifested here, which is why you feel so good here.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: This is the nature of dreams.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: And to your question who am I, I think I know how to answer, I am the one you want to see next to.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: It's so amazing...

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Night is the moment when the world talks to the stars, and hearts talk to dreams.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: I don't even know your name...

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: And I don't have a name, I don't need it, don't think about it.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: And if I want to wake up and get out of this dream?

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: You can always wake up, but don't you feel better here?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: You're right. It's such a liberating feeling.
Some time later...

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Why are you disappearing?

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Meetings in dreams are like tiny stars, they leave their mark, but disappear at dawn.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: It was still a dream, but it was so realistic... As if she was there.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Probably, some moments can be stored only in the heart.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: I need to go wash up.

anyType.Name: Door
anyType.Text: Knock... Knock...

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Are you there? Are you alive?

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: And are you still asking me such questions? She opened the door with a key.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: What am I doing here? And who didn't answer me? I was already afraid that something had happened to you.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: As soon as you told me that you were going to the hospital, I didn't get any more news from you.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: You know I'm worried about you...

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Oh, sorry. After going to the doctor, I was not up to the phone and when I got home, I immediately went to bed.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Has your condition become even worse?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: No, nothing like that. That's not the point at all.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: What is it then?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Well, I'd like to finish washing first.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: OK, I'll wait. Finish your business, and then we'll talk.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Make yourself at home, I'll be there soon.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Did she come here? Because I didn't answer?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: So, well, I sort of cleaned myself up, I look better, but these bruises under my eyes... I can't remember myself without them anymore.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: M-m-m... What is this fragrance.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Come here, it's time for breakfast.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: But I didn't cook anything.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Well, you said it yourself to make me feel at home. And I remember where all the things are after all these years.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: If I didn't cook anything, what would you eat? Just cereal again? So you will have problems not only with your head, but also with your stomach.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: So sit down, and let's have breakfast.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Well, I won't refuse. Enjoy your meal.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: As for how I got here, you gave me the keys to your apartment yourself, did you forget that you gave your keys to your best friend a few years ago?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Oh, I really forgot already.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: I came to make sure you're alive. I was so worried.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Now tell me what happened yesterday?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: I went to the doctor again, this time he told me that it was possible to have an operation.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Operation? Seriously? That's wonderful.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: But that's not all that happened to you?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Yes... The chances of a successful operation are low, and even if it is successful, there is a risk of complications that may be worse than my current condition.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: What a nightmare. But know that no matter what happens during the operation, and what you will be after it, I will be with you.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Have you already signed the consent for the operation?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: No, I'm not sure what to do yet.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: But I'm just really worried... Is there anything I can do to help?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Thank you for your concern, but I'll deal with this myself.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Although there is something I need help with. The doctor told me not to stay at home these days, although I really want to stay here.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Oh, that's great, I get it. Then we'll meet at the cafe tomorrow. I'll text you where and at what time. And it's not up for discussion.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: But... Okay, it's useless to argue with you.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Okay, I'll go first. There is no need to accompany. While.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Bye.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: She's always been like this, at least something hasn't changed over time.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: And yet, the operation... the potential will get rid of these torments, but with such complications... What should I do?
The same evening.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: It's so late, it's time to go to bed. Moreover, tomorrow it will be necessary to get up early so as not to be late.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Nice to see you.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: You... here again? Why?

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Remember, this is your dream, your dream world. If I'm here, then you want me to be there. A bit mysterious, isn't it? Hee-hee.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: While I'm here, let's go for a walk along the forest path.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: With pleasure, let's go.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: I wonder what kind of forest it is? So unlike anything I've ever seen.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: But the dream doesn't have to be ordinary, does it?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: You're right.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Oh, look what a lovely creature!

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Unusual, but what is it?

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: It is necessary to ask you, your world is still.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Don't you want to give it a name?

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Hee hee hee, you're so funny.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: "Hohei" - how do you like this name?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: How I felt that I shouldn't do it.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: "Hohei"? Why this name?

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Oh, come on, it turned out nice.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Wordplay, nothing special.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Let's go, because everything interesting is waiting for us ahead.
Some time later...

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Wow, we've already gone through the whole forest. Look at how many stars there are!

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Yes, it's so beautiful here... it's like being in a fairy tale.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: I think it's even better than a fairy tale.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: For some reason it seems to me that I will wake up soon.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: While there is still time, I want to ask you one more question, will I meet you again? And if so, will you stay here forever?

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Yes, we will definitely meet again and...

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: What did she say? I can't remember until the end. Eh.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: What time is it now?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: There is still a lot of time, you can not rush anywhere.
Two hours later.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: I'm late, I'm late... I need to hurry. How could I be half an hour late?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: She's already sitting at the table, eh...

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Welcome! It's good to see you.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Sorry. I didn't want to be late.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Nothing new happened, you were always late.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: And it's cozy here.

anyType.Name: Waiter
anyType.Text: What will we order?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: I'll take...

Response.AnswerText: Do you have borscht? I would like it and kvass.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: I'll take the Caesar salad and pasta.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: I'll take the Caesar salad and pasta.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: I'll take the Caesar salad, pasta and cocktail, and he'll have pasta with barbecue and something to drink.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: And I was already hoping that you would decide to eat something healthy.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Oh, unexpectedly!

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: I think that's enough for us.

anyType.Name: Waiter
anyType.Text: OK, we will bring your order now.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: You look tense. Something happened?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Nothing serious, just a headache started.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: And what to do?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Don't worry, it'll pass soon.

anyType.Name: Waiter
anyType.Text: Here is your order, bon appetit!

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Bon appetit.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: And you.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Let me taste your drink, and I'll give you mine.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Mmm... The cocktail is delicious.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Yeah, it's the best cocktail in the area.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Since the doctor told you not to stay at home, then tomorrow we need to go somewhere. How about a walk in the park near your house? As in childhood?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Yes, come on, we haven't walked there for several years.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Wonderful! I missed our walks so much.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Once we've eaten, and I've already paid, so let's go home.
Back home.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: I wonder if I'll meet that girl again in my dream. I'm thinking of going to bed early.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Hi.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Hi... I'm glad we met again.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Like I said, I'm here again.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Yes, it is. Do you remember our conversation at the end of the last meeting?

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Of course I remember.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Could you repeat the answer to my question again? Will you always meet me in your dreams now?

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Have you forgotten already?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: No, that's not it. I just didn't hear what you said.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: How strange, because it's just a dream. Maybe you just didn't want to hear that answer from me?

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Well, I'll answer, but whatever happens later. In the meantime, look at this beautiful moonlight.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Yes, it's really great.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Let's change the situation, it's getting boring here. Shall we move to the forest of elves?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: A forest of elves, like in fantasy novels?

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: You could say that.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: How beautiful it is here! Such huge trees and houses, some even on trees.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Look, there's a target and a bow. Let's shoot?

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: I'm the first!
After firing three arrows, she hit right on target each time.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: And I don't even know how to shoot.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Great!

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Thank you.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Now it's your turn.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: But I can't.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: It's simple, pull the bowstring, aim and shoot.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Okay, just don't laugh.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: I promise to try.
After firing three times, none of the arrows reached the target.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Hee-hee.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Eh.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Tell me, I wonder why we are in the village of elves, but they are not here?

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Maybe they just didn't show up because you didn't want to.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Maybe you only wanted to be with me?

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: This is for your honesty

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: That's how it is, you have to be more honest.
She kissed him.
She frowned.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: It's time to say goodbye, we'll continue next time. Bye, bye.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Goodbye...

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Kha... Kha...

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: And I've already started to forget that I'm just a step away from death.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Is it lunch already? It's time to pack up and go.
Having reached the destination.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: I even came earlier this time. It remains only to wait for her.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Who are we waiting for?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Oh, you scared me. Hi.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Haha, hello.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: How do you feel?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Actually, not really, today was another headache attack, so that's it, but I think that everything is fine now.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Why are we just sitting there for so long? Let's go for a walk.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Okay, let's go...

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Look how beautiful the fish are. One, two, three... how many!

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: I've never seen so many of them here before.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Let's go buy bread to feed them.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Yes, with pleasure.
They're coming back from the store.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Here's your half.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Thank you.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: There were even more of them as soon as we threw bread.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: They ate everything so quickly.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Let's move on.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Ahem... ahem...

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Does your head hurt again?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Yes, it will pass soon. Let's sit on the bench for now.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Is it normal that you spend so much time with me? After all, you have a job, and it's not a day off. Won't you have a problem with that?

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Don't worry about it, I work remotely, and I have plans for the week ahead fulfilled. And if anything, I can say that I have some difficulties. Hee-hee.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: I see you like working as a designer.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Yes, and how is your job?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Nothing special, I quit three weeks ago. And there are no problems with money, I have accumulated enough.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: The headache is gone, let's move on.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: It's getting dark, it's probably time for us to disperse.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Yes, probably. Tomorrow I will wait for you at my house at 10 o'clock, let's go to the forest for a picnic. See you tomorrow!
Back home.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Mmm...

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: My head hurts so much, I barely got home.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: We need to fall asleep and rest faster.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: I've been waiting for you.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Hi.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: What do you say about traveling to different places? If you don't mind, of course.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Oh, hello! Of course I don't mind. The last adventure was so interesting and exciting.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: I'm very glad you liked it. Then let's hit the road - I know a lot of amazing places that I want to show you.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: How do you like this palace? Extraordinarily beautiful, isn't it?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Not just beautiful - magnificent and majestic!

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: I'm glad you liked him. Then let's move on to the next item on today's agenda.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Which one is that?

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Today we are waiting for a ball right in this palace - just for the two of us.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: But I can't dance, and there's no music here...

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Oh, you don't have to worry about not being able to dance. And I'll deal with the music now.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Come here.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Unbelievable, I'm doing it!

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: And it turns out very well!

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Ugh, finally we're done.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: After that we will go to the next place.
They visited several other different places.
On a floating island.
We rode canyons on the frozen ocean.
We visited the library where the stories of all the worlds are recorded.
We went fishing from a pirate ship.
Tried the rarest fruits.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: This is where our adventure today comes to an end.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Already? It was just incredible, so many new and interesting things.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Goodbye.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: She disappeared again as suddenly as she appeared.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: I can't even imagine what it would be like to fall asleep one day and not meet you.
Having gathered, he goes to an appointment.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Girl, aren't you waiting for me?

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Who knows, but who are you? Hee-hee.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: And where did you lose the horse? Hee-hee-hee.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Well, with your bruises under your eyes, you really look like a zombie.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Well, you're a bore...

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Okay, let's go.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: The weather is so beautiful, isn't it? Just the perfect day to enjoy a moment together.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Yes, this is exactly what we need. The nature around us creates such an atmosphere of calm and relaxation.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Look, there's a lake. What if we spend some time on the shore and refresh ourselves? The water looks so attractive.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Great idea.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Look what I have! Hee-hee, gotcha! How do you like the water?

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Oh, you got it! Now I have to take revenge!

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Okay, okay, you won! But I won't give up!

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: I want you to know that I am always here for you. Whatever difficulties come, we will overcome them together.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Looking at you, I know that our path ahead will be bright.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Look, the sun is starting to disappear below the horizon. What a beautiful end to the day.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: So it's time to go back.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Then where would we meet tomorrow? Can't think of anything?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: If you don't have any ideas, then I'll choose, we'll go to the cinema.

anyType.Name: Caption under the picture
anyType.Text: "Moments that strengthen our bond."
Coming home and falling asleep.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Something about this night...

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: I'm here!

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Every time I meet you, a feeling awakens in my heart that the world is so beautiful and full of mysteries.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: All right. The world is full of mysteries, and that's what makes it interesting.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: I'm glad you're here.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: It may sound strange, but I feel that with every meeting you become a part of me. My feelings for you are so strong that sometimes I even begin to doubt whether this is reality or still a dream.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: I feel like you're something I've always missed. And I'm ready to go anywhere, just to be near you.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: Your words are the most valuable of all the riddles of this world.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: While I have time, tell me, how long will I be able to meet you in my dreams?

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: I still haven't answered, as long as your inner self needs me, I'll be here.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: You know, today I received a message from the doctor that tomorrow I have to come and give my consent to the operation.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: And so I thought, the inner self needs you because I'm sick, but what will happen after the operation?

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: You're starting to think in the right direction.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: It's time for me to leave, goodbye.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: But how so, I don't want to lose you!..

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: It all depends on your choice.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: If we don't see each other again...

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: I don't want to lose her. But I'm so scared...

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Already tonight I will have to give my final decision.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: But which one? I do not know ...
After much thought, he began to pack up and went to a scheduled meeting.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Look at the beautiful lights of the city! The evening is just fabulous.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: It will be an unforgettable evening.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: That's the movie theater. Look how it sparkles!

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Yeah, we haven't been here for a long time.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: I am so glad that we are spending this evening together.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: What a cozy room! I haven't been to the cinema for a long time.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: It looks like the movie promises to be interesting. Have you noticed how much attention everyone is watching?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Yes, it's impressive. Probably, the movie is really good.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: I can't believe what an unexpected twist!

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Yes, screenwriters really know how to surprise.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Did you see how the Hero unexpectedly met his old friend?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Of course, it was a shock for everyone, including me. I was sure he would never see him again.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: It's so touching...

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Yes, such moments make you think.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: The movie seems to be ending. Time has passed so quickly.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Yes, but I'm glad we could share this evening together.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: The movie was really exciting. It's so great that we decided to spend this evening here.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: I agree, it was unforgettable. Thank you for sharing this evening with me.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Come on, it's time to get back to reality.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Soon you will have to go to the hospital to make a decision.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: You know, before that I want to say something important.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Of course, I'm all attention.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: I wanted you to know that I appreciate you more than words can express. I have long been... I'm in love with you.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: I... I don't even know what to say.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: I know we had our difficulties, but... I want to be there for you, to support you in everything, no matter what you decide. We can get through this together.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Thank you for telling me that. You... you are also important to me.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: (I can't deny that she means a lot to me. But is it worth taking the risk and taking the next step?)

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Are you okay?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: With a smile. Yes, I just think a lot about what's going on. Thank you for sharing your feelings with me.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: We can go step by step. I'm not rushing you.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: With a deep sigh. Thank you for understanding.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Thank you for guiding me. It was a really wonderful evening.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Yes, I was. I'm glad we got to talk.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: So what do you think?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Looking down. This... something I'll have to deal with. But I promise I'll think about it.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Have a good night.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: You too.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: She's real. Her feelings are sincere, and I feel the same. But it's so difficult.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: This whole day has been so intense. On the one hand, the joy of what she said, but on the other – an incredible tension.
Getting to the hospital.

anyType.Name: Doctor
anyType.Text: I've been waiting for you, come in.

anyType.Name: Doctor
anyType.Text: Hi. How are you feeling today?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Not very good. These thoughts... these solutions... they give me no peace.

anyType.Name: Doctor
anyType.Text: I understand. Making a decision that can affect your whole life is not easy. I'm here to support you in this.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: I feel empty. On the one hand, I want to live. I want to build a future, enjoy the moments.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: But on the other hand, these pains and the fact that everything can get even worse... I am afraid that the operation may not be successful, and I will find myself in a worse situation.

anyType.Name: Doctor
anyType.Text: Your feelings are absolutely understandable. The operation is a serious step. We have data about your condition and potential risks, but the decision is yours.

anyType.Name: Doctor
anyType.Text: It is important to listen to your inner voice and understand what is most important to you.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: I just don't know which way to choose. What if I make the wrong choice?

anyType.Name: Doctor
anyType.Text: There is no such thing as a "wrong" choice. The choices you make will reflect your values, dreams and fears. Life is full of uncertainty, and it's important to move forward with what you feel inside.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Thank you for your support.

anyType.Name: Doctor
anyType.Text: By the way, you should understand that if you refuse surgery, you won't be able to live long. But if you agree, there is a chance.

anyType.Name: Doctor
anyType.Text: Of course, the chance is very small, your condition is unique, and people like you can be counted on the fingers of one hand. But if everything goes well, then the problems with the head will disappear.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Then I choose...

anyType.Name: Doctor
anyType.Text: Most likely it was a difficult choice.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: I still hope that everything will be successful.

anyType.Name: Doctor
anyType.Text: Well, I'll go inform you about your decision and in the next three hours we will begin.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: So right away?

anyType.Name: Doctor
anyType.Text: There's not much time left by the end.

anyType.Name: Doctor
anyType.Text: You're ready, aren't you?

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Yes, I... I'm ready. I can't say I'm not afraid, but I know it's the only way.

anyType.Name: Doctor
anyType.Text: Everything will be fine. Just relax.
The operation has begun.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: You're awake.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: You're... here.

anyType.Name: Girlfriend
anyType.Text: Of course, I will always be there for you.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Now I can go forward, build my future... together with you.

anyType.Name: Doctor
anyType.Text: Most likely it was a difficult choice.

anyType.Name: Doctor
anyType.Text: I won't dissuade you. This is most likely our last meeting.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Goodbye.
Returning home, another headache attack occurred, which could not be compared in strength with any other, having lost consciousness, he fell and did not get up again.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: You chose the dream world, you chose me.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Yes, it is.

anyType.Name: Hero
anyType.Text: Where are we now?

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: We are in the world that you created by your decision.

anyType.Name: Girl
anyType.Text: This is the place where our adventures will begin.
